pages.text: The $(mob)Dwarf$() is a helper that spawns at high elevations in Extreme Hills biomes of the $(thing)Overworld$(). $(mob)Dwarves$() attack $(l:grimoireofgaia_orc)$(mob)Orcs$() on sight, either in melee, applying $(thing)Slowness$() and $(thing)Mining Fatigue$() on hit, or at ranged with a bow which may apply $(thing)Slowness$() or $(thing)Weakness$() potion arrows. Upon death, a $(mob)Dwarf's$() may spawn a hostile $(l:grimoireofgaia_valkyrie)$(mob)Valkyrie$() in its place.
$(mob)Dwarves$() drop $(item)Ore Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a random ore found in the $(thing)Overworld$().

$(mob)Dwarves$() drop $(item)Gold Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while held to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of gold. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Medium)$().
